title: 84.0263 ISSUING QUITCLAIM DEEDS.
text: The commissioner of natural resources is empowered to issue quitclaim deeds in connection with loans made by the now defunct Department of Rural Credit, a former state agency. The commissioner shall issue the quitclaim deeds upon reasonable evidence the state of Minnesota no longer has a valid claim of title to the property involved. No fee shall be charged for the issuance of a quitclaim deed.
